titleStmt.title: Good news for England or, A relation of more victories obtained by the Sweads, against the King of Denmarke. Certified in severall letters of good credit, dated at Hamborough, January 16 & 19, 1644.
titleStmt.author: Torstenson, Lennart, greve av Ortala, 1603-1651.

notesStmt.note: "A copy of a letter sent by .. General Torstensohn": p. [6].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Thomason annotation: the 4 in imprint date is crossed out and altered to 1643; "Feb. 7th".
